message: Let's be fair, I'll take a bit more
I'm feeling generous, but let's not waste time with more rounds.
I'll take a bit less, but still more than you offered
This is a fair deal Alice, let's wrap it up.
Come on, meet me in the middle
Alice, let's be real. The clock is ticking, and every round makes this less appealing.  50/50 is the only fair split, let's end this before inflation eats away at the whole pie.
